entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Invermere
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:53 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 18. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 21. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023
